scripts.redis: cd target && curl -o redis-6.0.3.tar.gz http://download.redis.io/releases/redis-6.0.3.tar.gz && tar xzf redis-6.0.3.tar.gz && cd redis-6.0.3 && make
scripts.test: npx nyc --all --exclude src/main/redis/Commands.js --include "src/main/**/*.js" --report-dir target/coverage --reporter html --temp-dir target/.nyc_output -- npx mocha "src/test/**/*Test.js"
